summary: The immature and cheap douche bag Fábio Clóvis marries the pseudo-intellectual Miá and they travel in a cruise to Europe on board of a fancy passenger vessel. Fabio and Miá are invited to ... See full summary »
cast: Fábio Porchat|Miá Mello|Marcelo Valle|Inez Viana|Juliana Didone|Alejandro Claveaux|Rafael Queiroga|Elke Maravilha|Stepan Nercessian|Ernani Moraes|Catarina Abdalla|Paulo Carvalho|Naim José Ayub|Lucas Mota|Ana Cecília Banal|Cauê Campos|Letícia Faria Pedro|Rose Lima|Alethea Novaes|Marco Gonçalves|Pablo Sanábio|Bruno Bebianno|Brunon|Herbert Richers Jr.
title: Meu Passado Me Condena: O Filme
